entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Net.Security.Tests.SslStreamCertificateContextOcspLinuxTests.FetchOcspResponse_FirstInvalidThenValid test failure #97836
  • Setting\getting a function pointer field with reflection not supported #97833
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE: loads pt 2 #97831
  • Setting\getting a function pointer field with reflection not supported #97830
  • RVA fields can be set in Mono; should throw FieldAccessException instead #97829
  • Memory Leak inside of System.Speech & Microsoft.Speech #97822
    Future
  • [Mono] [Arm64] Add SIMD support for vector constructors using other vectors #97815
  • [mono][ios/tvos] DynamicInvoke_DateTimeAndCustomConstantAttribute_DateTimeParameterWithMissingValue test failure on CI #97809
    9.0.0
  • .NET 8 Genenerics runtime issue #97807
  • [NativeAOT] NativeAOT Guide : How To Debug NativeAOT? NativeAOT Update Suggestions #97804
  • 18 regressions around string #97825
  • .NET 8.0 Desktop Runtime doesn't include Hungarian language pack #97802
  • can we re-open System.Text.Json deserializing of object[bool] does not produce boolean #29960 #97801
  • Linker uses "RelevantToVariantCasting" as heuristic for a type passed as a generic parameter with static interface constraint #97798
    Future

Closed

  • WasmTestOnBrowser-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests time out #97112
    9.0.0
  • Update code fix for SYSLIB1054 to use a collection expression #96964
    Future
  • Could not load type from assembly #97834
  • (Performance) Simd vector loaded from memory instead of register multiple times #97046
    9.0.0
  • ArrayPoolEventSource.BufferDropped event is not documented at learn.microsoft.com. #96199
  • Executable published for osx-arm64 does not work on the new Macs #96501
  • Behavior changed during binding to collections in Net 8 #97558
    9.0.0
  • System.Text.Json.Serialization: Converter from attribute is ignored #97803
  • [mono][tvos] `System.Linq.Tests` crashing in `mono_gc_wbarrier_value_copy_internal` #97224
    9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Publish NativeAOT Project With Configure Manager Can't Got Result #97707
  • [browser][MT] RandomTests.Shared_ParallelUsage #91538
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix ARM64 signed small type cmpxchg for 8.0 atomics #97839
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Fixes exception while debugging on Chrome as IDE #97838
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Remove use of `NewHolder<>` as field. #97837
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Update TensorPrimitives to vectorize for size(T) is 1 or 2 #97835
    area-System.Numerics
  • Implement faster RSA key check #97827
    area-System.Security
  • [workloads] Update net8 mobile workload definitions #97824
    area-Build-mono
  • [NativeAOT] ELF ARM: Produce different relocation type for B and BL #97823
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Port diagnostic for certs with ephemeral keys on Windows to S.N.Q #97819
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [RISC-V] Implement replacing safe-point call instructions under GC_STRESS #97818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Patch libunwind to hotfix validation pipe creation race #97817
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add Sve.IsSupported support #97814
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] Prevent misoptimization by clang #97811
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add ARM encoding group IF_SVE_CI_3A #97808
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ARM64-SVE: Implement IF_SVE_DW_2A, IF_SVE_DW_2B, IF_SVE_EB_1B #97800
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Fix isKnonwNonNull for box and unbox #97799
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [browser][MT] JSSynchronizationContext_Send_Post_Items_Cancellation #97832
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Devirtualize more based on whole program analysis #97812
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][llvm] Run a few llvm passes on the emitted methods to reduce m… #97744
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Support ClientCertificateContext on QuicConnection #97821
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Use collection expression syntax for library import fixer when possible #97806
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • Update constant prop to only consider certain hwintrinsics #97616
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Avx512 support to ProbabilisticMap #96931
    area-System.Memory, 9.0.0
  • Share unified UTF-8/16 parsing with BigInteger #95402
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix TensorPrimitives.Abs for 0 for signed integers #97820
    area-System.Numerics
  • [browser][debugger] Tests bind_static_method error propagation #97816
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Patch libunwind manually to fix the access violation to unblock source build #97813
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [mono][llvm] Fix memory leaks in the llvm backend. #97788
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [wasm][mt] throw from blocking wait on JS interop threads #97052
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Ensure edge likelihoods 1/N #97740
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix handling invalid collection items in configuration #97777
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 9.0.0
  • [browser][mt] Unify multithreading switches #97560
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • [RISC-V] Test TotalOrderIeee754ComparerTests: Fix NFloat - NaN testcases for RISC-V #97340
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] Call missing genProduceReg in genCodeForCompare #97805
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] Fix trashing r4 register in RhpCallCatchFunclet #97810
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] install rejection handler on workers #97752
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Reenable tests for ##97224 which is fixed now. #97797
    area-System.Linq
  • [browser][mt] fix WebWorkerTest.JSSynchronizationContext_Send_Post_Items_Cancellation #97775
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Unblock `RandomTests.Shared_ParallelUsage` #97769
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser
  • Enable use of RestoreConfigFile property in source-build #97778
    needs-area-label

Updated

  • Expose AVX512F embedded rounding intrinsics. #97415
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Implement ARM32 atomic intrinsics #97792
    arch-arm32, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Test #96650
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • Fast field access #97784
    area-System.Reflection
  • [Mono]: Reduce Mono AOT cross compiler x64 memory footprint. #97096
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Late cast expansion: multiple candidates #97773
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • STJ: Avoid duplicate initialization of required or init-only properties #97726
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Return all error messages instead of throwing on the first error in linker tests #97605
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_IF_4A` to `SVE_JK_4B` #97739
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • Remove HELPER_METHOD_FRAMEs from built-in marshalers #97432
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [mono] Save trimmed methods list to a file #97705
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Implement more ServicePoint properties #97537
    area-System.Net
  • Set DisableArcadeExcludeFromBuildSupport & support DotNetBuildTests flag #97762
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add API call for Arm64 Sve.LoadVectorNonFaulting #97695
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that the Create(Dot(...)) optimization doesn't kick in for Vector2 pre SSE4.1 #97074
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update ILLink.CodeFixProvider.csproj #97796
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/8.0-staging] ServiceKey comparisons use Equals for matching #96847
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0-staging][mono][debugger] Fix decode_value_compute_size #97568
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0-staging] [wasm][debugger] Do not send to IDE the eval scripts #97702
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-browser, 8.0.3
  • [Mono] [Arm64] Add basic Vector3 SIMD intrinsics #97416
    area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • Add separate properties for keep-in-sync versions #97643
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Optimize BigInteger.Parse(powerOfTen) #97589
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Optimize BigInteger.Divide #96895
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Faster IndexOfAny for IgnoreCase Ascii letters #96588
    area-System.Buffers, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • Optimize Interlocked.CompareExchange use in Task #93953
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Fix hanging on subsequent `dotnet new` #97764
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [iOS] Introduce support for linking ICU libs #97216
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [mono][interp] Add SSA transformation and SSA based optimization #96315
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [RISC-V] Test HalfTest: fixed payload preservation testcase for RISC-V #96888
    community-contribution, arch-riscv, needs-area-label
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Spanify parts of IL reading in ILCompiler #97794
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Source built short stack support #97725
    source-build, area-Build-mono
  • [JsonSerializer] Add support for out-of-order metadata reads. #97474
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] dispatch across threads via emscripten #97669
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • mark-ro-instrumentation #97482
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • Refine Bin/Hex parsing of BigInteger #95543
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Expose TLS details for QUIC connection #93014
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Fixed wrong comment in XxHash64 #97747
    community-contribution, area-System.IO.Hashing
  • Remove built-in COM interop support from Mono runtime #97789
    area-Interop-mono
  • Handle open types to appear in interface maps #97733
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Use VM's copy of daccess.h #97751
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Mark most specific static DIM for types marked RelevantToVariantCasting #97487
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 'dotnet test' broken after upgrading .NET SDK from 7.0.302 to 8.0.100 #38473
  • Don't show welcome message when `--getProperty` was passed #38444

Closed

  • Inconsistent/invalid argument handling in 'dotnet tool' #38471

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38465
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Support wildcards when ignoring baseline TFMs #38374
    Area-ApiCompat, 9.0.1xx
  • Add missing SDK dependency to global.json #38426
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [Issue #37501] Verbosity Options default to `minimal` from `quiet` #38277
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • add tool list format option #37394
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • IP: .NET tool roll forward error experience #38210
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2367366 #38207
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Include version in deps.json #38087
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

PullRequests

Created

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MsBuildWorkspace throws exception when netcoreapp2.1 app is loaded #71919
  • "The server disconnected unexpectedly" when using package referencing Microsoft.CodeAnalysis #71914
  • Should speculative semantic models be able to disable nullable analysis? #71904

Closed

  • When automatically converting an "if" statement into a conditional expression using the C# editor, unintended conversion may occur. #70750
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce allocations during NamespaceSymbol.LookupNestedNamespace #71921
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix code that errantly assumed a paramarray parameter must be an array #71920
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Align `params` type validation with the the spec #71918
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Update to 8.0.0 in 17.10 branch #71916
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Helping runtime diagnose a CI bug #71913
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Fixed the Go To Definition for ValueTuple #71912
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Handle ref safety of user-defined conversions #71911
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Report better warnings and errors if build hosts exit abnormally #71909
    Area-IDE
  • Enable implicit primary constructor parameter capture analyzer #71905
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Cleanup SolutionCreator code. #71915
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Disallow UseConditionalExpression with unsafe or checked/unchecked blocks #71917
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Revert "Merge pull request #71412 from vibeeshan025/main #71853
    Area-IDE, untriaged, OnDeckForQB
  • Fix NewtonsoftJsonVersion problem #71876
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Write and read uniformly in objectwriter/objectreader #71877
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Allocate exactly the space needed when creating a sourcetext #71886
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Disable autoBraceSurround on 17.9 P2 tests #71897
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Provide overloads to avoid unnecessary boxing #71894
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #71910
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #71908
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to release/dev17.10 #71907
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move to Preview 4 image #71899
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to release/dev17.10 #71906
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update 'use collection expression' to support implicit reference conversions with arrays #71836
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Share common code in compilation tracker #71858
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Remove support for base extensions #71883
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use `/generatedfilesout` in generated SyntaxTree.FilePath #71879
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fail tests if errors are reported #71893
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve syncing of project cones. #71826
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve use of SyntaxContext in snippet and method/type import completion providers #71872
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement module cancellation and stack probing instrumentations #71896
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Semantic snippets: Work on `ctor` snippet after modifiers #71869
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Let the formatter format the whitespaces when converting an ArrowClauseExpression to a ReturnStatement when applicable #71757
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` (attempt 2) #71793
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Prevent error propagations by misplaced semicolon in list parsing #71712
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Using Nullable Disabled semantic model to compute semantic classification #71036
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Switch the BuildHost to build with net6.0 again #71881
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Sit object reader/writer on top of pipes. #71880
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add `Lock` object feature #71716
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [PR VALIDATION] extend live table data source #71539
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Refactors LSP server extension assembly loading #71862
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Upgrade Language Server to run on .NET 8 #71903
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor SSR Forms Submit Method Data Binding #53768
  • Perf regression: updates #53767
  • Add IdentityToken property to Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.OAuth.OAuthTokenResponse #53765
  • UseExceptionHandler does not work with PublishAot #53764
  • When adding AuthN/Z, check if middleware is already added #53760
  • Optional work onAssignment for custom events added through `blazor.registerCustomEventType` #53759
  • HTTP 413 Payload Too Large even after setting increased request limits .net6 web API #53751

Closed

  • Hot reload becomes very slow with dotnet watch and Blazor #52757
    9.0-preview2
  • Hot reload .cshtml not working in IIS #52946
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.OAuth.OAuthTokenResponse.cs does not contain id token #53761
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.QuickGrid CSS not loading #53504
  • Invalid List Of Components when using "required" keyword #53742
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, endpoint, fortunes_ef #53616
  • SignalR - Blazor Server - .Net7.0 Connection Disconnected #53517
  • Not able to configure HTTPS endpoint using self signed certificate. #53187
  • Blazor web app @rendermode="InteractiveServer" Losing Claims #53588
  • Performance Issues with multiple Components rendering in Blazor Web Assembly #53704
    9.0-preview2

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] [Component governance] Bump the Azure.Identity dependency #53774
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Bump Microsoft.Data.SqlClient version to 4.0.5 #53772
    tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • Update Microsoft.Data.SqlClient version to 2.1.7 #53771
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Bump Microsoft.Data.SqlClient version to 4.0.5 #53770
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.x
  • Update OAuthTokenResponse.cs #53763
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Update OAuthHandler.cs #53762
    community-contribution, area-security
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `dddb219` to `4565741` #53755
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • FabricBot: Onboarding to GitOps.ResourceManagement because of FabricBot decommissioning #53753
    area-infrastructure
  • Move SB metadata to intermediates #53749
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Resolve change token leak in Blazor hot reload #53750
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview2
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `7e33b6a` to `4565741` #53756
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.2
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `dddb219` to `4565741` #53757
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.16
  • Update Selenium #53766
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview2
  • [Blazor] Enable regex constraint on the Blazor router #53533
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview2
  • [Blazor] Fix package layout #53752
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview2
  • Quarantine RST_STREAM_IncompleteRequest_AdditionalWindowUpdateFrame_ConnectionAborted #53745
    area-networking, 9.0-preview2

Updated

  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Prevent NRE in ExternalLogin.razor #53222
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • [Blazor] Enable websocket compression for Blazor Server and Interactive Server components in Blazor web #53389
    area-blazor
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Fix `@key` not being respected for interactive WebAssembly components after publish #53748
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.3
  • [Blazor] Fixes encoded `/` on Blazor Router #53538
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor
  • Force Logout API to get SignInManager from services #52949
    area-mvc
  • Better implementation of EventCallback.Equals #53395
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Android apps lose button label alignment after screen rotation #20301
  • Simple, packaged WinUI MAUI app publishing fails to produce an app that can start #20299
  • Bluetooth Adapter State Issue on Mac After Upgrading MAUI Project to .NET 8 #20297
  • [testing] Enable FlyoutHeaderWithZeroMarginShouldHaveNoY #20296
    .NET 8 SR3
  • [iOS] CollectionView containing a Footer and a Border with StrokeThickness set to decimal value crushes on scroll #20294
  • [Essentials] Secure storage on Android GetAsync returns null even after Set #20292
  • Global style disables specific style #20291
  • Long running animation crashes app (Android) #20289
  • Evaluating javascript in MAUI WebView on IOS returns NULL #20288
    Backlog
  • .Net Maui DatePicker control's PreferredDatePickerStyle for iOS is not working properly. #20285
  • ModalPresentationStyle is not respected when using NavigationPage #20284
  • WebView MAUI WinUI Memory Leak #20283
  • clang++ exited with code 1 #20282
  • Unintended scrolling occurs when deleting and adding data bound to CollectionView on iOS. #20281

Closed

  • MSB4062 error when publishing an Android APP without Visual Studio #20300

PullRequests

Created

  • [Core][Hosting] Resolve handler services through registered service types #20298
  • Update SecureStorage.android.cs #20293
    platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Relative source binding for gradient stop fix #20287
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview1] Revert "Dont build net8" #20286

Merged

  • [CONTRIBUTING.md] performance-related changes #20295

Updated

  • [iOS] Add iOS17 tests again #19941
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/testing
  • [Trimming] Improve TypedBindings #19995
    area/app-size 🤏
  • [Trimming] Add a feature flag to disable XAML loading at runtime #19310
    area/publishing 🏁, stale
  • Fix OnBackButtonPressed on iOS (#8296) #14137
    area/navigation 🧭, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • Account for margins on sizes returned from Editor #20249
    area/controls 🎮, control-editor
  • [iOS] Clear BindingContext when cell is queued for reuse #14619
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • Fixed android toolbar icon change #20166
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area/toolbar
  • Adding a test to validate loading images #20147
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, .NET 8 SR3
  • Add Frame observer for UIWindow frame changes #20237
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Fix 19647 #20127

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Navigation properties not loading properly #32991
  • How to build CASE statement when using ExecuteUpdate #32990
  • Odd value reset for property setter forwarding to complex type #32989
  • Complex type comparison to inline instance doesn't work if some properties aren't listed inline #32988
  • ExecuteUpdate passed a complex type instance throws when using existing table values in the update #32987
  • The error that Sequence contains no matching element occasionally happens when application just start #32985
  • Query/Test: change query test infra to output SQL whenever we encounter an exception during query execution #32984

Closed

  • Entity materialization using StringPool #32986
  • Spell Check has issues with field names create by Scaffold-DbContext (C#) #32970
  • Translatable columns #32657

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix OPENJSON postprocessing with split query #32978
  • Fix daily build selection image. #32975

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Also catch type initialization errors when attempting to load types that might not exist #32941
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0] NuGet package readme files #32982
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0] Stop specifying incorrect column name in snapshot for owned type of generic entity type #32963
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.3
  • Fix to #32939 - Accidentally using field instead of property for JSON metadata produce hard to understand exception #32966
  • Split SQL Server functional tests into two projects #32953
  • Stop throwing eagerly when looking up a ValueGenerator #32930

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-01
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete security-partner-dotnet pipeline #18496
  • Add FreeBSD x64 and ARM64 RIDs #18493

Merged

  • Support --source-build / -sb switches as well in the VMR #18492
  • [main] Increase timeout for license scan #18462
  • [main] Update SDK diff exclusions #18491
  • Update SDK diff exclusions #18489

Updated

  • Stop using OverrideTargetRid, use TargetOS/TargetArchitecture instead #18476
  • Add VMR unified build pipelines #18409
  • Separate out the test exclusions that apply to stable SDKs #18423
  • Stop making src modifications to every repo's NuGet.config #18478
